body: Below are definitions of some common terms used here.
name: Definition of Terms
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms

sections.body: One of the standard eleven classes found in the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms/Core Class
sections.name: Core Class

sections.body: A class that progresses from level 1–20.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms/Base Class
sections.name: Base Class

sections.body: Generally equal to the number of class levels (see below) in a spellcasting class. Some prestige classes add caster levels to an existing class.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms/Caster Level
sections.name: Caster Level

sections.body: The sum of a character's class levels.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms/Character Level
sections.name: Character Level

sections.body: The level of a character in a particular class.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Prestige Classes/Definition of Terms/Class Level
sections.name: Class Level
